                                    </div>

                                    <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 end -->
                                    <!-- 回复 -->
                                    <div class="J_replay comment-main-list-item-content-info-replay">回复</div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 展示出的回复框 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">
                                <!-- 回复表单 在隐藏域中填写参数 -->
                                <form class="comment-quick-form" onsubmit="return false;" method="post" action="">

                                    <input type="hidden" name="comment_type" value="">

                                </form>
                                <!-- 表情包及表单提交操作 -->

                            </div>

                        <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply">

                    </div>
                </li>
                
                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论说明 start -->

            </ul>
                        <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠的评论 end -->
            <!-- 分页样式 -->
            <ul class="pagination"><li><a href="#comments" class="pageCurrent pagination-item">1</a></li><li><a href="p2/#comments" class="pagination-item">2</a></li><li><a href="p3/#comments" class="pagination-item">3</a></li><li class="pagedown"><a href="p2/#comments" class="pagination-item"><i class="icon-angle-right-o-thin"></i></a></li><li class="jumpToPage">转至<input type="text" class="input_num" id="input_num">页</li><li><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="a_jumpTo" onclick="return on_check_comment_page(3, '', this)">GO</a></li></ul>        </div>
